snippet: It is dangerous for any country, including America, to see itself as exceptional, whatever its motivation.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin warns it is dangerous for any country, including America, to see itself as exceptional; contends an American military strike against Syria, despite strong opposition from many countries, will result in more innocent victims and an escalation of violence in the conflict, and will have dire consequences for world peace and the proliferation of weapons of mass destruction.
lead_paragraph: It is dangerous for any country, including America, to see itself as exceptional, whatever its motivation.

headline.print_headline: A Plea for Caution From Russia
headline.seo: What Putin Has to Say to Americans About Syria
headline.main: A Plea for Caution From Russia
